Comments_List: I greatly improved my ability to speak in the past and future tenses of German and my understanding of German culture.
Excellent, caring, and passionate proffesor and TA made this course just fantastic! Thank you for being amazing instructors and people!

Yes, because the professors and learning assistants truly want to help you succeed in improving your language skills. They will work with you outside of class, and they do not judge you on your lack of experience.
